SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS.LEARNING_TEXT: Show that you are motivated to continually improve your skills, implement innovative solutions and stay abreast of new technologies.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Me
CONTACT.INTRO: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
CONTACT.EXAMPLE: Example: Feel free to get in touch with job offers or opportunities such as: ...
